      • searchProduct

        public BibliographicProductReference searchProduct(java.lang.String id)
        Searches for a bibliographic product in this user's library by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the bibliographic product to search for
        Returns:
        the bibliographic product reference if found, null otherwise

      • validateBookAddition

        public boolean validateBookAddition()
        Determines if it is possible to add a book to this user's library.
        Returns:

        public boolean validateMagazineAddition()
        Determines if it is possible to add a magazine to this user's library.
        Returns:

        Deletes a magazine from this user's library by its ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a message indicating whether the magazine was deleted successfully or not

      • readPage

        public boolean readPage(java.lang.String productId,
                        int numPage)
        Informs if the Ui must show an ad.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the bibliographic product
        numPage - the page number that was read
        Returns:
        true if an advertisement must be shown, false otherwise

      • getReferences

      • getLibrary

        public java.lang.String[][][] getLibrary()
        Returns a 3D array representation of this user's library.
        Returns:
        a 3D array where each element represents a bibliographic product ID or an empty string if there is no product at that position
